= Introduction =
 * Author: Fiendish/Bast
  * originally by Fiendish from http://code.google.com/p/aardwolfclientpackage, you will need the files from [http://code.google.com/p/aardwolfclientpackage/downloads/list here]
 * redirect chats to another world window

= Differences from Fiendish's Plugin ==
 * also redirects, Info, Global Quest, and Remort Auction

= Installation ==
 * it requires MUSHclient 4.51
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * channel tags must be turned on

= Help =
 {{{
/*
chats echo on   --> also echo in the main window
chats echo off  --> only show in the other window
*/
 }}}
